General.Description: Every developers in cryptocurrency community always want to provide users a large range of blockchain assets with convenience and security, TenX or PAY was born for this purpose. It is a blockchain-based platform that focuses on not only a debit card but also accompanying mobile wallet. Because The TenX is popular almost 200 countries, it is easy for the users buy or sell anything. Especially, everyone can access to the TenX token free cause it is open-source.
General.Features: The PAY contributed its own platform the TenX system, which help users easily pay, which for every transaction made with the wallet. By the Ether token, the holders can receive rewards, the profit and made all the transaction simply with the TenX card. Moreover, there is no additional fees imposed or exchange in one app. Just by one click, the participants can withdraw from any ATM around the world.
General.Technology: TenX has the network that connects all your blockchain assets to global payment platforms. With the applications, the TenX card is actually convenient for anyone to enjoy blockchain ecosystem and the real world. Furthermore, the COMIT protocol which allows the blockchain ecosystem to scale efficiently and continuously with improved accessbility can connect every blockchain .
